meanings.definition: The quality or state of being mundane.
meanings.sent1: The mundaneness of his daily routine made him yearn for excitement.
meanings.sent2: She found comfort in the mundaneness of her familiar surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The mundaneness of folding laundry became a thrilling challenge in her imagination.
meanings.sent4: The mundaneness of the office was like a heavy fog, obscuring any sense of adventure.
meanings.sent5: The mundaneness of the task was like a dull ache, never quite going away.

meanings.definition: The condition of being ordinary or commonplace.
meanings.sent1: The mundaneness of the town square contrasted with the vibrant market nearby.
meanings.sent2: He embraced the mundaneness of his daily commute, finding solace in its predictability.
meanings.sent3: The mundaneness of the situation was broken by a sudden burst of laughter.
meanings.sent4: The mundaneness of the room was transformed by a splash of color on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The mundaneness of the conversation was shattered by an unexpected confession.
